column5: Anyone know how the fishing is in Lake Manitoba? I will be duck hunting the northern end of Lake Manitoba the first week of October, and am wondering if it worthwhile to take any of the fishing gear. Thanks.

Lake Manitoba Narrows (located more-or-less about half up the lake) can be excellant in the fall for large walleye. There is a lodge there but I can't recall the name. They do have an internet site so a search should come up with it.
http://www.narrowslodge.com/ is site of lodgesome big fish do get taken out of there, not sure at time you are going out thoughwwhttp://www.walleyewarior.com
Thanks for the info. I am going to be at the top of the lake. I think I'll take a bit of gear and see what luck I'll have.Tom
